website_summaries.verdict: Though there have been occasional durability issues, this is a budget-friendly necklace that can be customized to almost any name and numerous chain lengths.
pros: An affordable name necklace that comes in gold, rose, or silver-tone over stainless steel in a variety of chain lengths (14 to 22 inches)
Can be made with almost any name

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Necklace
customer_reviews.text: I love it !! I’m happy it was available for prime and I didn’t have to wait for it to be made! :) hopefully it won’t change anytime soon. UPDATE: it’s been MONTHSSSSS & this necklace has not budged!! I’m shocked for $10 I haven’t had any change or making my neck green and I have showered in it, sprayed perfume ; cleaned it I mean I’m really surprised and everyone asks me where I got it ! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaVic

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but like it's so cute. I didn't have high expectations for this necklace, but I was so surprised. As long as you don't expect something hella expensive feeling then you will love this necklace too. (Don't get me wrong though it doesn't feel super cheap.) It feels like jewelry you would buy at forever 21.
customer_reviews.author: JIMIN is HERE

customer_reviews.title: Cute but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Really cute necklace unfortunately you get what you pay for. I've had two of these and they both broke in a really short period of time. If you wanted a name necklace i'd say just spend the money and get a nice one, it'll save you time and money in the long run. But other then that it came in a really nice box and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie 🖤

customer_reviews.title: No discoloration months later.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chain in October and have been wearing it daily and it is still holding its color. I do remove it before I shower and do wait until my perfume dries before putting it on so to avoid any discoloration. For the price it’s definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: MissEtiquette

customer_reviews.title: The chain is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: 1st off I purchased this with free 1 day shipping so I received the next day. 2nd I love the necklace, very sturdy but I love the chain! My previous name necklace had the chain break after only 20 days and I never slept in it, etc. I was sad and it took over a month for the replacement chain that was also made out the same flimsy design. I wanted something with a normal chain. My other necklace also tarnished extremely bad as well as the chain. I'm hoping this one doesn't. But if it does, it's not expensive ($9.99) so I can buy more lol
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: I got the silver on stainless steel because I know my skin pH discolors things. I want it for a few days and no discoloration so yes it is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Godiva17ns

customer_reviews.title: Read
customer_reviews.text: The chain is very cheap. Not silver, it’s more just like metal. And although it is indeed centered on the chain, and the right length, the capital letter is bigger than the others so it doesn’t sit centered, no matter what you do. It’s heavy, from a mold, not a thin piece, like those laser cut ones you can order from Walmart. Packaging was nice and it shipped and arrived pretty quickly, much quicker than it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lin

customer_reviews.title: Way Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the chain would be too chunky looking, but it's really not. The whole thing is very delicate looking. I haven't worn it very long but I did sweat a lot with it on due to a long walk yesterday, and it's showing no signs of discoloration. Honestly I'm really impressed. I'm glad I didn't drop money on a real gold one, this one honestly looks just as good.
customer_reviews.author: lemonsquare7

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend and she has worn it every day since ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend and she has worn it every day since Christmas, in and out of the shower, and it has held up so far. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: She Lives it
customer_reviews.text: Met a new Gurl named Danielle. A great way to amplify someone's attraction is to wear their Name. My Girl lived this great way of showing attraction. This was the second one of these that I purchased, the first one was given to a random resident at a questionable Appartment Complex.
customer_reviews.author: Danglin Fury

customer_reviews.title: I love my necklace
customer_reviews.text: I love my necklace. It's really shiny and it's got a good weight to it. It's light enough that it doesn't really feel like it drags around the neck but it's heavy enough that it doesn't feel cheaply made. It feels well made but the chain it's on feels delicate. However, it's held up well so far. I guess my only real hang up is the clasp is on the opposite side. I think traditionally the clasp goes on the right side, not the left, but that doesn't really hinder it's functionality and I plan to wear this pretty much every day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bi

customer_reviews.title: Loved it was exactly what we wanted for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it was exactly what we wanted for my daughter then it snapped while on her neck for no reason and we just got it less then a month ago it’s may 21st and it snapped today and got it may 9th
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great necklace
customer_reviews.text: I love the necklace! I only had a slight problem that it broke at the clasp link the first time I wore it but I took it to a jeweler who said it looked like it might have been a bad link that wasn't tightened and he tightened it for me at no cost and it has been perfect ever since! Fast service and even an email asking how I liked it afterwards! I wish all sellers on amazon cared this much!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute name plate
customer_reviews.text: It looks a lot better in person than in the pictures, IMO. Super light, customizable and adjustable chain to get a variety of lengths. However, the piece looks and feels like it may easily discolor and break. It's not something I plan to wear everyday, but if you do, I would keep in mind the quality I described and look for something a bit sturdier or of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t my first time buying from this seller. Each time everything I’ve ordered was as pictured and came earlier than expected. The necklace is absolutely stunning and came with a little wipe to wipe off the necklace and a little gift box. I will be purchasing more jewelry from this seller soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dollhouse88

customer_reviews.title: Came broken dispointing
customer_reviews.text: Look I was really looking for a necklace with my name on it that would come quick....turns out quick isn’t always the best because the necklace came broken and a little discolored. I mean it’s fine if it didn’t come broken but I feel like it just wasn’t worth the money because now I have to go out and by a chain for the necklace. Just save your money and look at a different seller. Smh
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong name!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been fine if I it read Courtney instead of Christina. Wish I would have opened it and looked at it before adding it with my daughter's other birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Philsfox

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order because I am very impressed. I waited to write a review to see how it would hold up. I wear it almost daily and shower in it twice a day and it looks perfect. No dull or changing of the gold. I will be gifting more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this, will order another one
customer_reviews.text: I love this, will order another one, it's a little delicate, I had to tighten the hoop that attaches the name to the necklace as it came undone the first time I wore it, but since it's been great, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY CHILDRESS

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A lot nicer than what I realized, and cheaper than what I’ve paid for my daughters from somewhere else. The letters are larger than the standard name necklaces too, which I had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brookielynn214

customer_reviews.title: yess
customer_reviews.text: Still Gold 6 days later showered with it on & everything. lets see how long it stays gold. Update: Its been over a month and i havnt taken it off once, still is the same color! I see they raised the price by $1. i might try to buy another necklace from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the way it is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not able to personalize. The way details are listed are misleading. This necajlsce comes with the name in the picture. You can not email to personalize they will direct you to their website. Disappointed in the way it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is pretty! No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Is pretty! No complaints. I got one for myself and liked it so much I got one for my sister for her bday. I haven’t worn it but a couple times so I can’t say it discolors or anything but it’s nice. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa98

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: The chain and script gives the necklace a very delicate look, though it seems quite sturdy. It has an adjustable clasp (different places to hook it to adjust the length), and it stays where you put it making it lay perfectly at the length you need. Very beautiful and elegant. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Embrie

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Thought it was hypoallergenic and started itching my neck 15 minutes after having it on. It looks very very cheap like something out of a gumball machine or from a Dollar Store
customer_reviews.author: Angel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Super cute !
customer_reviews.text: love it, its cute and stylish, I love the writhing and what it says it means a lot to me and its nice to always have that reminder around my neck, but just be carful, I have gone out a few times with it on backwards, make sure the clasp is on the left side .
customer_reviews.author: em_sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter last Christmas “2018” and she loves it. She’s been wearing it almost everyday since and gets so many compliments on it. The color never changed and it’s still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this necklace❤ it is lightweight but it doesn't change colors or irritate my skin. U can always change the necklace for a more durable one!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: This is the second necklace that we have bought from this seller and we have not been disappointed yet! Cute style and good quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son's teenage girlfriend. It's a nice gift, but don't buy it for your fiancee or wife. Spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I buy this necklace. Not their fault but mine, I have lost it and keep on buying it. LOVE it!!! I can shower with it and it just look amazing overall. 10/10 woulb buy again (hopefully I don’t loose it... third time’s the charm)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty necklace
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful necklace. My daughter is allergic to most jewelry, but has had no reaction to this one despite wearing it constantly for the last week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and it's sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is perfect! I was hesitant since it was so affordable but I've been wearing it for a month now and it's still holding up, not turning my skin green and looks shiny and nice! I don't normally leave product reviews but this was worth it cuz I'm so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for uncommon name
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter has an uncommon name. We have never been able to buy her anything with her name on it. This was the perfect gift, a necklace with her name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear on my vacation to help people remember my name - it was a huge hit! I wore it every day in the pool and it went well with my evening dresses, too!
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaZ in MN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality necklace!
customer_reviews.text: Love my necklace! I’ve gotten nothing but compliments and ppl asking where I bought it from! I also have very sensitive skin and anything fake or with fake qualities can make me breakout and itch but this necklace doesn’t make me break out! It also hasn’t turnt colors and I’ve had it for st least 2 months showering with it every time I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I do wish the Joy portion was a little less dainty and more visible
customer_reviews.text: I do wish the Joy portion was a little less dainty and more visible, i.e., its too tiny of a word. But I do like it and very seldom can I find joy jewelry that is not Christmas jewelry so it is meaningful to me, Joy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy St John

customer_reviews.title: So cute for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I got name necklace for my flower girls and they love them!! Great quality for such an affordable price! The chain is a little weak but I still give it five stars. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and durable for the price it’s a great purchase ! It’s made of stainless steel also , so it won’t rust ! Fast shipping too !
customer_reviews.author: Bill DeRose

customer_reviews.title: What’s my name
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad the name necklace is back in style! I wear this all day everyday, it hasn’t shown any signs of wear. I also got my sister one, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: including showers and it still looks good and has not broken
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this necklace now for about 2 months, wearing it every day without taking it off, including showers and it still looks good and has not broken. She is very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: So cute that I hate taking it off
customer_reviews.text: So cute that I hate taking it off. It’s not too big and not too small. Perfect sizing and the chain is a nice length. I get dozens of compliments whenever I wear it. First piece of jewelry I put on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Marie93

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this necklace I just ordered a new one because I broke my other. This nice is nice in size and doesn’t irritate my skin nor does it turn me green or leave any rashes. I have very sensiative skin and I sleep in this necklace , shower , the pool, beach all of that.
customer_reviews.author: ADORI

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this necklace hangs lopsided. It could be because an odd extender has been attached to the back. Clasp won’t close on its own, you have to push it close. Would not reorder this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Cute necklace for the price. I've worn it for a few days now and I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: The necklace looks exactly like the picture. It's a little smaller than I expected but its still rather attractive. I've been wearing the necklace for two weeks and the chain and pendant still look like new. The clasp is starting to tarnish a little bit though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length & perfect size name plate!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by how PERFECT this necklace is! I have been looking for a while for my name in gold. Finally ordered this item. I have had SO many compliments every time I wear it! Highly recommend for you or a present for someone you love!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jensen

customer_reviews.title: No color change or irritation
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this necklace since APRIL 29 and let me tell you how this necklace is the real deal. I take a shower with it ! I’ve been in the pool with it hell I’ve even went to the cayman island for 10 days and was swimming in the ocean i take a shower with this necklace on every single day and it has not changed color or caused irritation. Love it and it still amazing till this day
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: If I could do 6 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: This neckless is absolutely beautiful! I'm gonna get all the girls in my family one. Looks like a very expensive piece but very affordable. 6 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Nice I ordered the name Victoria it was werid the way the name came it was like the c n t were together not two separate letters eaghhh I would return but it took 2 months to get soo 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Michelle santos

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE CLASP ON NECKLACE
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when this necklace arrived. It did not have the clasp on the necklace to actually make the necklace attach from one end to the other! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It is very short, even with the extension. ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very short, even with the extension. There is no larger loop for the clasp to hook to, making it very difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice and shiny, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordering another, my grandson ripped it off my neck. Just the right size, lettering not huge but definitely big enough to read.
customer_reviews.author: Norine Siple

customer_reviews.title: Customized and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this necklace to keep my daughter's name close to my heart. It is exactly how I imagined it. The necklace is a bit thin but the name plate is thick and wears nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Keila L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s TINY! And it broke day 1!! We waited so long but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ChevellesHeroes

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great "Joy" necklace for the Holidays...as well as my name is Joy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift and she loved it. I just wish it was a little bigger, other then that it was really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Necklace is smaller than I thought, but its beautiful, the bracelet is hard to read cos of its smaller size, I would have skipped it, but oh well the price was good
customer_reviews.author: dulcie

customer_reviews.title: My gf never wants to take it off and I love seeing my name on her chest thanks guys
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it and can’t stop wearing it. 👸🏾✨ She tagged me in a post on Tumblr that said: “I’d rock a lil gold necklace with my boo’s name on it faithfully” and I reblogged it, replying “BET” It makes me happy every time I see my name on her chest 😍 This was a gag gift but I feel very loved now 💕 Definitely a win
customer_reviews.author: Christina R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I ordered this chain for an early birthday gift to myself. It looks exactly like the picture. I did Amazon prime and it came as promised. Happy blessed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Debmun1215

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful necklace.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful necklace. Very well made. Ordered it as a Christmas gift for my secret Santa & she ABSOLUTELY loooooved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: HUAN XUN necklace is so pretty
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is exactly how the seller described it. I really enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Small and dainty
customer_reviews.text: I really like this necklace. I wish I could find it in other names as well. It's pretty small and dainty. Part of me wants to find one of the giant versions, just for fun. I got this as part of my female Ghostbusters' costume to be Patty. It worked pretty well, though her necklace with her name is larger.
customer_reviews.author: StarsSky

customer_reviews.title: Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is worth the price. The material is good in that it does not rust or change color over time. I have owned the necklace for nearly two years and it looks like I just purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: skby1

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice in person, more expensive than it truly is! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Going to be an Xmas present for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Kollean Gouyton

customer_reviews.title: a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is the style that I wanted and I guess you get what you pay for. It's a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cute necklace
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute necklace but ir is not as easy to read as it shows the letters are much thicker
customer_reviews.author: Debjo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I’ve gotten good feedback from my friend so... 5stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Believe it's gold plated..take a shower with this on and never turns odd color like it's a cheapy. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Valdez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Quality is decent for what you pay. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love it..
customer_reviews.text: Initial review was 3 stars complaining of the size... but I've had it over 3 yrs and it hasn't changed. Alot of ppl commented on how cute it is , and asked where to purchase it....so I update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Way quicker than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. We created a custom name they definitely din't have in-stock, and it still arrived 19 days after ordering. Which was a lot quicker than expected and estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: good size. good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my siuster for Christmas, I have bought a necklace like this with my name for myself before and it was soo small when it arrived u couldn't read it. I was afraid of the same thing with this one but it was a pleasantly nice size. she loves it and wear it all the time
customer_reviews.author: chrystal

customer_reviews.title: I really love this. I bought a couple more to give ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I bought a couple more to give as gifts after I received the one I bought for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dartez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful necklace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this necklace discounted through Amazon reviewers and I absolutely LOVE it! I was worried the name plate was going to be too small but it is just the right size. The name plate is very sturdy and is not easily bent. The clasp is easy to grasp and put on. You can also adjust which length you want to wear it on. All in all, this is a great product I would definitely reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: samantha l gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice look. My daughter loves it. Looks like a very cheap chain that will break very easily. Not surprised though. It is a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough that you can read it, but small enough that it's not overwhelming. Hasn't turned green or tarnished in about 2 months of daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Nothing really
customer_reviews.text: I don’t dislike anything about it. It’s so cute and beautiful just how I wanted it ! I love how it says my name and I recommend buying it, it’s absolutely really beautiful !
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: and I have already recommended them to all my friends and co
customer_reviews.text: I have worn it everyday since I got it. I have VERYsensitive skin and generally can't wear any metals without breaking out. This is a winner. I will definitely order from this seller again, and I have already recommended them to all my friends and co workers
customer_reviews.author: MeFloHO

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It
customer_reviews.text: this is beautiful i’ve honestly been wanting a necklace of my name and this is perfect its still in good conditions (i take it off when i shower) and its looks like a great material definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: but the quality of the writing is good and overall quality seems okay
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn yet so I don’t know how it’ll wear or how the gold plating will last, but the quality of the writing is good and overall quality seems okay! I wish the chain was more adjustable so I could make it a bit shorter, but I’m satisfied so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 - both had no clasps
customer_reviews.text: I've now purchased two of the "Blessed" word necklaces (I returned the first one as defective) and both times I have received a necklace with no clasp. Other than that, the necklace is well made and I like it, I just can't wear it without the clasp. If you purchase one of these, be prepared to attach your own clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wade

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEE  this necklace
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this necklace and so does everyone else it looks great I purchased it in gold as well. I wear it constantly including in the shower and it hasn't tarnished yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship is lovely
customer_reviews.text: The custom name or positive words that I chose are truly a blessing and I have given one away as a gift for a friend who recently lost a loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty necklace, the size is just right on the neck. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: amanda hill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Necklace!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace is amazing. I’ve had it for about a month and a half now, and it’s is amazing. I saw some negative reviews but they were wrong. The metal doesn’t bother my skin, there’s no discoloration, it still looks brand new. I of course didn’t wear it everyday, but it still lasted, and was better then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nardos

customer_reviews.title: 10000% would recommend love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this necklace so much! And for the price you can’t beat it! It looks beautiful in person, and it feels so sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Fluffybutt

customer_reviews.title: ok...
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute but looks too fake even though it is lol. Would buy again but not for everyday use...
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it! Bought it for her birthday! 4 stars because i havent taken it out the wrapping yet, just saw it through the package
customer_reviews.author: Snapchat: Karma104

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected I have a silver one and now I have the gold to match just perfect for my layering necklace looks
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is beautiful! Looks elegant and not cheap at all. The font is great and the writing is well done. I haven't tested it in the shower and I will probably not and I am curious how long it takes to change its appearance. I gave four stars because it has a small scratch on the front of the name.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Angel or Angela ????
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter ordered a necklace that said Angel. She received a necklace that says Angela!! 😂 no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, big bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, I’ve bought it twice but the bracelet is always too big. It needs to be taken in. That’s the only con. Other than that, great bang for buck!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Loved getting a custom necklace so fast! Glad they have some preñase! Nicer than the picture!!
customer_reviews.author: Mika R Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday or Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a cute gift box/jewelry box. Perfect for little girls! Not too flimsy, either. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Just like picture and gold doesn’t look too yellow or fake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear in May 2017 for Rolling Loud festival. Despite being through sweat and heat and any water situation this thing doesn't rust or anything. Almost a full year later and I'm not even scared to wear it in the pool, shower, ocean, etc. because the gold hasn't rubbed off and it still is in perfect condition!! I love it(-:
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: I love this necklace! ♥
customer_reviews.text: I've had and worn this necklace for almost a year now and it still hasn't changed colours or irritated my skin! I have a nickel allergy and usually break out when wearing cosmetic jewellery but I have yet to have even one problem with this. I love mine so much that I'm going to buy one for my sister for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Feels genuine. Barely there when I wear it. Not taking a chance to wear in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Caden Lane
